ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Recall context for survey
Notes: e.g., ''Thinking of your entire lifetime'' or ''Since April 1, 2020''

ElementDescription: Form used/assessment name
Notes: e.g., Self-Report, Parent Form, Short Form, Revised Version

ElementDescription: Has your access to extended family and trusted friends changed since April 1, 2020?
Notes: 0=No, there has been no change; 1=Yes, there have been mild changes: continued in-person visits with social distancing or phone calls or through video chat or social media; 2=Yes, there have been moderate changes, with loss of contact with some friends and family, but not all; 3=Yes, there have been severe changes, with loss of contact with all of my friends and family; 99=No answer

ElementDescription: Has your access to food changed since April 1, 2020?
Notes: 0 = No, my access to food has not changed; 1 = Yes, I have had enough food, but difficulty getting to the store or finding items; 2 = Yes, I have occasionally been without enough food or good quality foods; 3 = Yes, I have frequently been without enough food; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: Since April 1, 2020, have you or anyone in your household been laid off or unemployed, even if employed now?
Notes: 1 = No; 2 = Yes, myself only; 3 = Yes, someone else only; 4 = Yes, myself and someone else; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: Since April 1, 2020, did you or anyone in your household have their hours or pay reduced at work?
Notes: 1 = No; 2 = Yes, myself only; 3 = Yes, someone else only; 4 = Yes, myself and someone else; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: (ASK IF nas_a17=02, 03, 04, 05) Have any of the following affected your ability to work for pay Since April 1, 2020? (I am/was sick with coronavirus symptoms)
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

ElementDescription: (ASK IF nas_a17=02, 03, 04, 05) Have any of the following affected your ability to work for pay Since April 1, 2020? (I am/was caring for someone with coronavirus symptoms)
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

ElementDescription: (ASK IF nas_a17=02, 03, 04, 05) Have any of the following affected your ability to work for pay Since April 1, 2020? (I am/was caring for children not in school or daycare)
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

ElementDescription: (ASK IF nas_a17=02, 03, 04, 05) Have any of the following affected your ability to work for pay Since April 1, 2020? (I am/was caring for an elderly person)
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

ElementDescription: (ASK IF nas_a17=02, 03, 04, 05) Have any of the following affected your ability to work for pay Since April 1, 2020? (I was concerned about getting or spreading the coronavirus)
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

ElementDescription: (ASK IF nas_a17=02, 03, 04, 05) Have any of the following affected your ability to work for pay Since April 1, 2020? (I am/was sick (not coronavirus related))
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

ElementDescription: (ASK IF nas_a17=02, 03, 04, 05) Have any of the following affected your ability to work for pay Since April 1, 2020? (none of the above)
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

ElementDescription: (ASK IF nas_a17=02, 03, 04, 05) Have any of the following affected your ability to work for pay Since April 1, 2020? (no answer)
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

ElementDescription: Are or were you or someone else in your household an essential worker Since April 1, 2020?
Notes: 1 = No; 2 = Yes, myself only; 3 = Yes, someone else only; 4 = Yes, both myself and someone else; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: Since April 1, 2020, have you or anyone in your household applied for Unemployment Insurance Benefits?
Notes: 1 = No; 2 = Yes, myself only; 3 = Yes, someone else only; 4 = Yes, both myself and someone else; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: Since April 1, 2020, how much difficulty have you/your household experienced paying rent or mortgage payments?
Notes: 1 = A lot of difficulty (have missed several payments); 2 = Some difficulty (have missed a few payments); 3 = A little bit of difficulty (have not missed any payments, but it was a struggle); 4 = No difficulty (no problem paying rent or mortgage payments); 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: Since April 1, 2020, have you or someone in your household lost housing, either owned or rented?
Notes: 1 = No; 2 = Yes, myself only; 3 = Yes, someone else only; 4 = Yes, both myself and someone else; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: (ASK IF nas_cv5=02, 03, 04) How worried are you about getting evicted or losing your housing in the next few months?
Notes: 1 = Very worried; 2 = Somewhat worried; 3 = A little worried; 4 = Not worried at all; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: Have you personally been diagnosed with COVID-19?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes, I was diagnosed, but effectively managed symptoms at home; 2 = Yes, I was diagnosed, and required brief hospitalization; 3 = Yes, I was diagnosed, and required intensive care; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: (ASK IF nas_cv12=01, 02 OR 03) Did you experience symptoms related to COVID-19 for longer than 1 month?
Notes: 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: How many people in your immediate family have been diagnosed with COVID-19?
Notes: Number of people

ElementDescription: (ASK IF nas_cv12B NE 0, 999) Please rate the symptom severity of the person who was the sickest.
Notes: 1 = Mild: symptoms effectively managed at home; 2 = Moderate: symptoms severe and required brief hospitalization; 3 = Severe: symptoms severe and required intensive care; 4 = Immediate family member died from coronavirus; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: How many of your extended family member(s) or close friends have been diagnosed with COVID-19?
Notes: Number of people; 999 = No answer

ElementDescription: (ASK IF nas_cv14  NE 0, 999) Please rate the symptom severity of the person who was the sickest.
Notes: 1 = Mild: symptoms effectively managed at home; 2 = Moderate: symptoms severe and required brief hospitalization; 3 = Severe: symptoms severe and required intensive care; 4 = Immediate family member died from coronavirus; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: Are you considered an essential worker? An essential worker refers to occupations that were considered as part of the ''Essential Critical Infrastructure Workforce'' during the COVID-19 pandemic, as necessary for continuity of functions critical to public health and safety.
Notes: 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 97 = Don't know; 99 = Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: (Ask if nas_a17 < 06) During the last 12 months, did you telework or work from home for pay because of the COVID-19 pandemic?
Notes: 0 = Yes, all of the time; 1 = Yes, most of the time; 2 = Yes, half of the time; 3 = Yes, less than half of the time; 4 = No; 97 = Don't know; 99 = Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: Has your household income changed significantly since April 1, 2020 due to the COVID-19 pandemic?
Notes: 1 = Yes, it has increased; 2 = Yes, it has decreased; 3 = No, it has stayed the same; 97 = Don't know; 99 = Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: Since the pandemic began, have you used any of the following: (other food support not listed
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

ElementDescription: Since the pandemic began, have you used any of the following: (none of the above)
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

ElementDescription: Have you received a COVID-19 vaccine?
Notes: 1 = Yes, 2 doses of Moderna or Pfizer; 2 = Yes, 1 dose of Moderna or Pfizer; 3 = Yes, 1 dose of Johnson & Johnson; 4 = Yes, 2 doses of another vaccine (i.e., AstraZeneca) or I’m not sure which vaccine; 5 = Yes, 1 dose of another vaccine (i.e., AstraZeneca) or I’m not sure which vaccine; 6 = No, I have not received any COVID-19 vaccine; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: Have you received a COVID-19 vaccine booster shot?
Notes: 1 = Yes; 2 = No; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: In the last survey you told us you were previously diagnosed with COVID-19. What month and year were you diagnosed? (Month)
Notes: 1 = January; 2 = February; 3 = March; 4 = April; 5 = May; 6 = June; 7 = July; 8 = August; 9 = September; 10 = October; 11 = November; 12 = December
